thread.title: Liverpool's James Milner sets Premier League record - for being an undefeated goalscorer
thread.title_full: Liverpool's James Milner sets Premier League record - for being an undefeated goalscorer

author: Richard Innes
title: Liverpool's James Milner sets Premier League record - for being an undefeated goalscorer
text:
James Milner goals: very, very valuable (Photo: Getty Images) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
James Milner is football's Mr Reliable. 
A hard working, ultra professional team player, the Liverpool midfielder/winger/left-back/fourth-choice keeper is so solid, he's a guaranteed seven out of ten every week. 
So, perhaps we shouldn't be too surprised that his GOALS are the most reliable in Premier League history. 
Allow us to explainâ€¦ Milner scores - and guarantees a positive result for Liverpool (Photo: Andrew Powell) 
Simply put, a James Milner goal means his side are guaranteed to get something from the game. When the former Leeds man scored Liverpool's goal in the 1-1 draw against Manchester United - a confidently struck penalty - we KNEW The Red Devils couldn't win the match. 
Because when James Milner scores, his team NEVER loses. "WHO DA MAN?" (Photo: Liverpool Echo) 
The match at Old Trafford was the 46th Premier League game in which Milner has scored a goal. And look at his record in those 46 games: Games in which James Milner scored Milner wins
